post.body: You have snow! You lucky person you. We just have rain, rain and then occasionally... rain.
Sounds good. But will Sam eat it :P
It's not too bad once you get going. I went out for a run yesterday and it was fine as long as I didn't stop!
Yay. The Jan sales will be the way to go.
Only if we get a very generous one. Otherwise it's already been earmarked for various savings :(
Give me a link once you're done and I can always say what I'd like to read most
Maybe something like http://skribit.com/ would help you out?
Well thanks for the help :) Night!
Never heard of a Tim Stace. Friend of a friend perhaps?
I am: http://www.linkedin.com/in/ltheobald . I'll get Lucy on tomorrow. It's another good idea :)
Chinwag - yes but not PeoplePerHour so thanks for the tip. And thanks for keeping an ear out too
They've useful. The trouble is where do you put them when you aren't using them? They're huge!
Congrats on winning the .Net podcast award. That'll show those Rissington chaps.
I think someone might want The Killer's album from Santa.
I have a CakePHP book I can always look stuff up in for you if that's any good!
You are missing the Xmas stuff on the desk. There's a lot of crazy Xmas tat!
Good call. Santa has to personally test all these games though. I bet he's a Gears of War 2 God!
Or is it 14 sleeps? Everyone's always too excited about Santa & the presents to sleep on Xmas Eve :P
Using an integer means you are supplying an exit status: http://uk.php.net/manual/en/function.exit.php (exit & die are the same)
I just also want to defend men and say we are not pants at shopping. I always get people thoughtful, nice gifts :)
@srcshelton @wallyBazoom Looks like the racing may still be on. The race course website says there will be another inspection @ 10
Some cookies in the shape of Santa would be nice :)
Cool. Well I ordered mine. Hope you sell out fast :)
@JamieKnight But remember IE6 added something stuipd like a 500 character to their bookmarklets! 1 more reason to press the btn
Well it's hit 100. Get commenting :) I'm interested in your take on it all
Thought that would be the case :)
Does it have to be a PNG? JPEG compression is better if you don't need all the features of PNG
Finishing the long, long day with a soak in a bath to help my aching legs.
Too tired to be able to solve my IE problems so hoping someone on the Boagworld forum will help give my brain a kick start.
Deployment went well except for an IE bug that is causing major issues! I now have till 9am tomorrow to try and fix it!
Hurray! Amazon have finally launched their MP3 store in the UK
Yay for end of the day deployments!
Ah Fail Blog, always good for a chuckle: http://tinyurl.com/5etmcl
Enjoying the web design/development advent calendar that is http://24ways.org/ . If you've not checked it out yet, you really should.
Looking at HD televisions and wishing I had the money
So the Tories have released a video of the "MP raid" and the police are being polite! Oh the horror of it all.
Had a nice night out with friends. Shame I missed Sam and @bethness. Now watching Batman
Just got a static shock off my iPhone! It still looks OK but time to get myself a anti-static something for these shoes
Wondering if I could have sent my Wii Fit to @boagworld while sleepwalking... Wouldn't put it past myself
Oh, so my short passwords with a mix of letters, numbers & characters are easier to guess than just one long word? Nope.
Hates sites that tell you that your password is "easy to guess" but don't say why.
Got some CSS that works in IE6 but not IE7. Shouldn't it be the other way round?
The Boagworld podcast is doing it's live recording now if anyone wants to join us: http://boagworld.com/live/
Every year my mum sends me a Xmas card filled with confetti & sparkly bits and every year I open the card standing up so it goes everywhere!
Grrr... Ocado shopping will be 45 minutes late but I'm starving
Sleepy and now filled with mulled wine thanks to the neighbours
Listening to Christmas songs. Yay Christmas!
Where is @bethness? I want pie!
Put my Xmas tunes into my daily MP3 rotation. Getting in the Xmas mood now!
Quick poll for anyone bored: What media player do you use? I need to get rid of the CPU time hungry beast that is iTunes.
To the kids carol singing in Waterbeach: You'll have more luck if you dont shout "I've only got 1 F***ING pound" before I even open the door
Was home at 5 o'clock. Could get used to this :)
I've been asked to style up the our customer login page for Xmas. A little fun project for tonight me thinks.
Can I change the canvas size in Illustrator CS4? I just can't seem to find out how to do it
Trying Illustrator CS4 for the first time and don't have a clue what I'm doing!
Yay! Xmas meal definitely on (although the racing might not be). So time to go feast!
Waiting to hear if the office Xmas meal at the races will be called off due to frost.
Hurrah! Only one full week left to Xmas.
The end of the first series of Merlin was pretty good. Shame I have to wait till next year for more.
Retweeting with better spelling: Saw this on the news http://is.gd/btwG . I worked there for 6 years. Sounds like nobody was hurt at least.
Saw this on the news. I worked there four 6 years: http://is.gd/btwG Sounds like nobody was hury
In the pub for mulled wine & stew
Wrapping my final Xmas presents. It's so close to Christmas! I must try not to get too excited or I won't be able to sleep on Xmas Eve :P
The latest .Net is being delayed for "exclusive content". I wonder what that's going to be.
Playing Jungle Speed. Everyone sucks but me! Mwahaha!
Been to the local church for their carol service. Feeling very festive now
Listening to my mum trying to explain why she's scared of kittens. How can someone be scared off kittens?
Looking through a cookbook and planning my raid on the butchers tomorrow
Damn this wind is bloody strong & bloody cold! Wish I was on a warm train and not at the cold station.
Just been shown how you can see whats been brought from your Amazon wishlist. Must resist the temptation to see what Ive got coming at Xmas!
Give it up for Fridays! Yay Fridays!
Charity pub quiz tonight. Time to put my crappy pop music knowledge to use!
Yeah @paulrandall . I agree with @leunix - big red button to clicky clicky. That number would grow very, very fast :)
Grumble... Stupid IE6... Hate... Grumble...
My Firebox order didn't have the usual bag of sweeties in it :( Is the credit crunch hitting Firebox's sweet supply
